content:
# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Spanish

# Target Word
whisper

# Text Fragment
She began to whisper during the meeting

# Paragraph Context
The room grew quiet. <fragment>She began to <target>whisper</target> during the meeting.</fragment> Only her neighbor heard her.
{"word_translation":"susurrar","fragment_translation":"Ella empezó a susurrar durante la reunión"}

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Spanish

# Target Word
sturdy

# Dictionary Definition
Adjective: firmly built; not easily bent or damaged

# Text Fragment
He built a sturdy table for the workshop

# Paragraph Context
He had gathered oak planks all week. <fragment>He built a <target>sturdy</target> table for the workshop.</fragment> It would hold heavy tools without wobbling.
{"word_translation":"resistente","fragment_translation":"Construyó una mesa resistente para el taller"}

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Spanish

# Target Word
detour

# Text Fragment
Traffic forced us to take a detour through side streets

# Paragraph Context
The highway was jammed. <fragment>Traffic forced us to take a <target>detour</target> through side streets.</fragment> We still arrived a few minutes late.
{"word_translation":"desvío","fragment_translation":"El tráfico nos obligó a tomar un desvío por calles secundarias"}
